reviewText: I purchased this DVD because I had recently purchased a firm roller and wanted to get more use out of the roller.  I truly enjoyed this workout...it went fast and it was unique.  I'm hoping to find some more firm roller exercise DVD's that are every bit as good as Karen Voight's!
The workouts are workable and enjoyable.  Karen Voight has a talent for creating the right workouts to suite different levels without compromising on the benefits.
